Subject: OOC HELP!

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="us-ascii"
From: KSLawdogg@...

SW:



::Climbs out of a bunch of fallen trees::

"I'M FREE!  AFTER 40 hours I'm free!"

::Screams as more trees fall on him::


OK, my absence is do to a power outage in Washinton State.  Some 120K families were out of electricity, and I've been 40 hours without electricity.  And I still am without power.  I'm at my dad's work, and I'm checking my mail at the CS webpage.  I've noticed a lot of incoherent posts.

For one, THE CYBERTRONIAN FIRE IS IN A HUGE WIDE GRASSLAND!  THE GRASS IS RATHER SHORT BY THE WAY IN THAT AREA!  THere's no where to hide!  THere are no trees!  No bodies of water!  It's all level!  And you can stab jets in the back with a sword.

So, I expect to be out of power for about 16 hours.  Then I won't be on for probablya nother 4.  So, I'm going to ask Yan for the first itme to officially pause the battle.  Because I'm gonna have to read 300 e-mails, and not to brag, but I play a rather important role in this battle.

Excuse me for the spelling mistakes and grammar mistakes, but I"ve got to go now.  So Yan, please, FOR THE LOVE OF ALL THAT IS UNHOLY, PAUSE THE BATTLE!


L. Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
PS: Can I borrow a generator?  Thanks.
